definition: quilt/by/(indicates passive-voice clauses)/(literary) to cover/to meet with/(coll.) (since c. 2009) used before a verb that does not accurately represent what actually happened, to describe with black humor how sb or sth was dealt with by the authorities (as in 被自殺|被自杀[bei4 zi4 sha1])

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
angiosperm (flowering plants with seed contained in a fruit)
angiospermae (phylum of flowering plants with seed contained in a fruit)

sentences.english: Back to the room to sleep, you may have seen her with the quilt, the mother.
sentences.chinese: 回房睡觉，也许你已见她加上的被子，那个是母亲。

sentences.english: He had such bad flu that they had to take him to the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 他得了严得的流感，只得被子送进医院了。

sentences.english: Quilting, he said, 'gives you a little bit of ownership.
sentences.chinese: 他说，做拼布被子让你拥有了一样小东西。

sentences.english: Oxygen gurgled in the green tubes above his bed.
sentences.chinese: 氧气在他被子上面的绿管中汩汩作响。

sentences.english: The cool night time, will cover the quilt, but during the day but still very hot.
sentences.chinese: 秋凉的时候，夜里要盖被子了，可是白天却依然很热。

sentences.english: Use comfortable soft sheets and comforter.
sentences.chinese: 使用柔软舒适的床单和被子。

sentences.english: She tucked the little boy in.
sentences.chinese: 她给小男孩盖好被子使其安睡。

sentences.english: T he whole process of the silk quilt is all hand made.
sentences.chinese: 丝绸被子的整个过程都是手作。

sentences.english: He had taken a chair and had sat down by the bed, leaning one arm on the coverlet .
sentences.chinese: 他搬了一把椅子，坐到床边，把一只胳膊搁在被子上。

sentences.english: SADAF ATASHBARGHI: "Some dogs like to be tucked in at night, before they go to sleep."
sentences.chinese: 有些狗狗在睡觉前会需要你给它盖上被子。

sentences.english: The writer writes the white book quite quietly in quilt.
sentences.chinese: 作家在被子里十分平静地写白皮书。

sentences.english: Flowers are reproductive structures that characterize angiosperms.
sentences.chinese: 花是被子植物特有的繁殖器官。

sentences.english: The male gametophytes of conifers and angiosperms are the POLLEN grains .
sentences.chinese: 松柏类植物以及被子植物的雄配子体即花粉粒。

sentences.english: Carol and I were even noisier than when we were inside.
sentences.chinese: 我和妹妹玩儿被子王国比在屋子里还要热闹。

sentences.english: The bed mat has traded, pad on a bed of a thin quilt.
sentences.chinese: 床上的凉席早已换走，垫上一床薄薄的被子了。

sentences.english: But if the bed- making is particularly pathetic, it may be a sabotage maneuver.
sentences.chinese: 但如果被子叠得特别糟，也许是故意的。

definition: quilt wrapped around the body as a tube (traditional bedding)/(contemporary) bedding/quilt/blankets/cover/bed
